document.full_text: british hard rock band the darkness is reforming after a five-year break to perform at the download festival on june 10 as the warm-up act for def leppard, they announced on their website on tuesday.
document.title: hard rock band the darkness back after 5 year break
lines_and_colors: british hard rock band the darkness is reforming after a five-year break to perform at the download festival on june 10 as the warm-up act for def leppard, they announced on their website on tuesday.
